author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #38283 for the EGM regression, to be in synch with the online GTs, as requested in https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/offline-gt-updating-egm-regression-tags-for-run-3-collisions-for-offline-tags/11203

The difference wrt the previous GTs are:
**run3_data**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun3_v8/123X_dataRun3_v7

**run3_data_relval**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun3_relval_v7/123X_dataRun3_relval_v6


#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 136.897,139.001`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of #38283 for EGM.
title: [123X] Include EGM regression in offline data GTs
